title: Soy Leaf Juice Bar & Healthy Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Offers an all-vegan menu of comfort foods, including organic juices, acai bowls, burgers, sandwiches, sides, soups and desserts. Uses local and organic products when possible. Will start to offer gluten free and raw food in April 2016. Inside seating consists of a 4-person table and an 8-person bar-height community table. The patio has three 4-person tables. Opened late January 2016. Same owner as Soy Leaf Garden Cafe.
